1101010001011011 1110010001110010 1 -> sum: 1011100011001110, cout: 1
0100101000000001 0111010110110101 0 -> sum: 1011111110110110, cout: 0

0000011100100111 0110000110101001 1 -> sum: 0110100011010001, cout: 0
0101110011011101 0000110100000100 1 -> sum: 0110100111100010, cout: 0
